title: DataManager class

code_examples.code: dataStore: {    /* The DataManagerItem type data collection of the SysModule schema. */    SysModule: sysModuleCollection,    /* The DataManagerItem type data collection of the SysModuleEntity schema. */    SysModuleEntity: sysModuleEntityCollection}
code_examples.context: DataManageris a singleton class available via theTerrasoftglobal object. The class provides thedataStorerepository. You can upload the contents of one or more database tables to the repository.
Properties​
The data collection repository.
Methods​
The scope of the callback function.
The scope of the callback function.
The record to add.
The record ID.
The record to delete.
The record to delete.
The scope of the callback function.
The record, changes to which to discard.
Properties​
Methods​
The column value.
The column name.
Discards the changes to the record made as part of the currentDataManagersession.
The scope of the callback function.
Returns the flag that marks the record as new.

code_examples.code: /* Define the configuration object. */var config = {    /* The entity schema name. */    entitySchemaName: "Contact",    /* Exclude duplicates from the resulting dataset. */    isDistinct: true};/* Retrieve the data. */Terrasoft.DataManager.select(config, function (collection) {    /* Save the retrieved records to the local repository. */    collection.each(function (item) {        Terrasoft.DataManager.addItem(item);    });}, this);
code_examples.context: Returns the flag that marks the record as changed.

code_examples.code: /* Define the configuration object. */var config = {    /* The entity schema name. */    entitySchemaName: "Contact",    /* The column values. */    columnValues: {        Id: "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",        Name: "Name1"    }};/* Create a new record. */Terrasoft.DataManager.createItem(config, function (item) {    Terrasoft.DataManager.addItem(item);}, this);
code_examples.context: Returns the flag that marks the record as changed.

code_examples.code: /* Retrieve the record. */var item = Terrasoft.DataManager.findItem("Contact",     "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001");/* Assign the new "Name2" value to the Name column. */item.setColumnValue("Name", "Name2");
code_examples.context: Returns the flag that marks the record as changed.

code_examples.code: /* Define the configuration object. */var config = {    /* The entity schema name. */         entitySchemaName: "Contact",    /* The primary column value. */    primaryColumnValue: "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001"};/* Select the isDeleted flag for the item record. */Terrasoft.DataManager.remove(config, function () {}, this);
code_examples.context: Returns the flag that marks the record as changed.

code_examples.code: /* Retrieve the record. */var item = Terrasoft.DataManager.findItem("Contact",     "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001");/* Discard the changes to the record. */     Terrasoft.DataManager.discardItem(item);
code_examples.context: Returns the flag that marks the record as changed.

code_examples.code: /* Define the configuration object. */var config = {    /* The entity schema name. */        entitySchemaNames: ["Contact"]};/* Save the changes in the database. */Terrasoft.DataManager.save(config, function () {}, this);
code_examples.context: Returns the flag that marks the record as changed.

callouts.content: Use examplesRetrieve the records from the Contact table/* Define the configuration object. */varconfig={/* The entity schema name. */entitySchemaName:"Contact",/* Exclude duplicates from the resulting dataset. */isDistinct:true};/* Retrieve the data. */Terrasoft.DataManager.select(config,function(collection){/* Save the retrieved records to the local repository. */collection.each(function(item){Terrasoft.DataManager.addItem(item);});},this);Add a new record to the DataManager object/* Define the configuration object. */varconfig={/* The entity schema name. */entitySchemaName:"Contact",/* The column values. */columnValues:{Id:"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",Name:"Name1"}};/* Create a new record. */Terrasoft.DataManager.createItem(config,function(item){Terrasoft.DataManager.addItem(item);},this);Retrieve the record and change the column value/* Retrieve the record. */varitem=Terrasoft.DataManager.findItem("Contact","00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001");/* Assign the new "Name2" value to the Name column. */item.setColumnValue("Name","Name2");Delete the record from DataManager/* Define the configuration object. */varconfig={/* The entity schema name. */entitySchemaName:"Contact",/* The primary column value. */primaryColumnValue:"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001"};/* Select the isDeleted flag for the item record. */Terrasoft.DataManager.remove(config,function(){},this);Discard the changes made as part of the current DataManager session/* Retrieve the record. */varitem=Terrasoft.DataManager.findItem("Contact","00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001");/* Discard the changes to the record. */Terrasoft.DataManager.discardItem(item);Record the changes in the database/* Define the configuration object. */varconfig={/* The entity schema name. */entitySchemaNames:["Contact"]};/* Save the changes in the database. */Terrasoft.DataManager.save(config,function(){},this);
callouts.html:
Use examples
Retrieve the records from the Contact table
/* Define the configuration object. */
var config = {
    /* The entity schema name. */
    entitySchemaName: "Contact",
    /* Exclude duplicates from the resulting dataset. */
    isDistinct: true
};
/* Retrieve the data. */
Terrasoft.DataManager.select(config, function (collection) {
    /* Save the retrieved records to the local repository. */
    collection.each(function (item) {
        Terrasoft.DataManager.addItem(item);
    });
}, this);
Add a new record to the DataManager object
/* Define the configuration object. */
var config = {
    /* The entity schema name. */
    entitySchemaName: "Contact",
    /* The column values. */
    columnValues: {
        Id: "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
        Name: "Name1"
    }
};
/* Create a new record. */
Terrasoft.DataManager.createItem(config, function (item) {
    Terrasoft.DataManager.addItem(item);
}, this);
Retrieve the record and change the column value
/* Retrieve the record. */
var item = Terrasoft.DataManager.findItem("Contact",
     "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001");
/* Assign the new "Name2" value to the Name column. */
item.setColumnValue("Name", "Name2");
Delete the record from DataManager
/* Define the configuration object. */
var config = {
    /* The entity schema name. */     
    entitySchemaName: "Contact",
    /* The primary column value. */
    primaryColumnValue: "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001"
};
/* Select the isDeleted flag for the item record. */
Terrasoft.DataManager.remove(config, function () {
}, this);
Discard the changes made as part of the current DataManager session
/* Retrieve the record. */
var item = Terrasoft.DataManager.findItem("Contact",
     "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001");
/* Discard the changes to the record. */     
Terrasoft.DataManager.discardItem(item);
Record the changes in the database
/* Define the configuration object. */
var config = {
    /* The entity schema name. */    
    entitySchemaNames: ["Contact"]
};
/* Save the changes in the database. */
Terrasoft.DataManager.save(config, function () {
}, this);
